title: Specifies information on storing and retrieving the entity.
description: Provides hints to the database engine and API as to how this entity should be managed in the persistence store.

isAudited.title: Whether all changes to this entity is tracked for  auditing.
isAudited.description: Indicates to the storage engine that all changes to this entity must be tracked over time. Usually used to time-travel, track or audit an entity's state changes.

tableName.title: Table name in the database to which this entity refers to.
tableName.description: Indicates to the storage engine which table in the database these entity persistence settings apply to.

schema.title: Schema name in the database to which the Table Name applies to.
schema.description: Indicates to the storage engine which schema in the database the entity TableName persistence settings apply to.

create.title: Specifies persistence behaviour related to creating the entity.
create.description: Provides behaviour related to the action of creating an entity, e.g. is the action enabled and whether events are raised when the action is triggered.

read.title: Specifies persistence behaviour related to reading the entity.
read.description: Provides behaviour related to the action of reading an entity, e.g. is the action enabled and whether events are raised when the action is triggered.

update.title: Specifies persistence behaviour related to updating the entity.
update.description: Provides behaviour related to the action of updating an entity, e.g. is the action enabled and whether events are raised when the action is triggered.

delete.title: Specifies persistence behaviour related to deleting the entity.
delete.description: Provides behaviour related to the action of deleting an entity, e.g. is the action enabled, whether events are raised when the action is triggered and soft deletes are used.
